item.name: Pure Powder Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.

item.name: Pure Powder Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.

item.name: Olive Oil
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Wild Grass
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained from Wild Herbs using Barehanded Gathering.

item.name: Pig Blood
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be extracted from a pig corpse using a Fluid Collector.

item.name: Pure Powder Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.
